lead_paragraph: When an Army Transport plane and its crew of four crashes in the ices of the Labrador, a captain must keep his crew's morale and spirits up as they await a rescue mission to lift them from the freezing and snowblown clutches of nature.
snippet: When an Army Transport plane and its crew of four crashes in the ices of the Labrador, a captain must keep his crew's morale and spirits up as they await a rescue mission to lift them from the freezing and snowblown clutches of nature.
